mapper.select: SELECT s.STOCK_ID AS stockId , s.SHORT_CODE AS shortCode , s.STOCK_NAME AS stockName , s.STOCK_TRADE_STATUS AS stockTradeStatus , p.PORTFOLIO_ID AS portfolioId , p.USER_ID AS userId , p.PRICE AS price , p.QUANTITY AS quantity , p.ORDER_TYPE AS orderType FROM STOCK s JOIN PORTFOLIO p ON s.STOCK_ID = p.STOCK_ID AND s.SHORT_CODE = p.SHORT_CODE AND p.USER_ID = #{userId}
